EmailTemplate.subject: NCS with The Challenge; Your contract
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team. Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
We hope that you are enjoying your role on NCS with The Challenge.
Our records show that you have not yet responded to the contract. We are writing to ask you to submit a response to your contract as soon as possible.
Please submit a response to all contracts within 24 hours of receiving this notice.
If you feel you are missing your contract please contact your Staffing Associate.
Many thanks for your assistance. NCS with The Challenge
Follow us on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn
